metro.TrainManagement.Trains

Class Train

  • java.lang.Object
    • metro.TrainManagement.Trains.Train

  • public class Train
extends java.lang.Object
    A Train can carry passengers, costs a bit to buy and maintain it. The costs of maintaining will also increase every month by a given factor (_costsFactor) and there is a maximum amount of passengers per train as well. All data about the trains are stored in the ./data/trains.txt file and are read & parsed by the GameState class.
    Author:
    hauke

    • Constructor Detail

      • Train

        public Train(java.lang.String name,
     java.lang.String manufacturer,
     int price,
     int costs,
     float costsFactor,
     int passengers)
        Creates a new train with the following properties. Every data for the trains are in the ./data/trains.txt file and will be read & parsed by the GameState class.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the train.
        manufacturer - Manufacturer of the train.
        price - Price for buying the train.
        costs - Costs per month.
        costsFactor - Monthly increase of the costs.
        passengers - Maximum amount of passengers per train.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        The model designation of the train.

      • getManufacturer

        public java.lang.String getManufacturer()
        Returns:
        Gets the name of the manufacturer of this train.

      • getPrice

        public int getPrice()
        Returns:
        Gets the price this train costs.

      • getCosts

        public int getCosts()
        Returns:
        Gets the monthly costs of this train without any consideration of the age.

      • getCostFactor

        public float getCostFactor()
        Returns:
        Gets the monthly increase of this train.

      • getMaxPassenger

        public int getMaxPassenger()
        Returns:
        Gets the maximum amount of passengers that can travel with this train.

      • getCurrPassenger

        public int getCurrPassenger()
        Returns:
        Gets the current amount of passenger that are travelling with this train.
